trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around July 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back from the mall in Selinsgrove, Pa and as I was coming down Market Street past the Hotel Edison I saw up above to the left of me an orange glowing orb in the sky. First thought maybe Mars was closer than usual-- the moon was huge in the sky. The orange light was hovering, and I didnt know what to make of it. Thought at first perhaps some kind of aerial fireworks-- it is July 2 as of this report but fireworks dont hover and move like that. I went back around the block to get a better view and it had dissapeared completely. I then contacted a ufo center in ohio and they told me to spread the news; I also googled and found many of the same exact orange fireballs reported in northumberland country here as well as through state college I contacted WNEP TV and they are talking to the meteoroloigst to see if anything was going on of interest that might have caused it.
